mapper.select: select * from darts_user_points where user_id=#{userId} and click_user_id=#{clickUserId}

SELECT rk.* FROM ( SELECT t.*,@rank := @rank + 1 AS rank FROM ( SELECT sum(d.points) AS points, d.user_id, d.game_type, u.nickname, u.headimgurl FROM darts_user_points d JOIN darts_game_order g on g.id = d.order_id AND g.auth_no = #{cno} AND g.end_time > #{end_time} LEFT JOIN wt_user u ON d.user_id = u.uuid GROUP BY d.user_id ORDER BY points DESC ) AS t, (SELECT @rank := 0) r ) AS rk limit 40
